content: UOB One Card Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 24 Jun 2019For the minimum 5 transactions per month for the UOB one card, does each GRAB ride count as 1 transaction?I understand that by having a minimum of 5 transactions per month, you will get certain perks, does using it for GRAB rides count?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

PatLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 27 Jun 2019Yep it does.If you are looking at the quarterly cash rebate, note that there's a total min spending of at least $500 monthly for 3 consecutive months.3 comments0

See all 3 comments Pat25 Jun 2019I'm not certain about OEM, but most likely yes? Might have to check. For the rest, yep they count, can attest to that. If the total of your payments hit min 500 then ya bro you are good to go~Nasarudeen Jamain27 Jun 2019Thank You!
